subject: College Athletics
Computers and the Internet
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: College sports fans descend upon wildly popular Web sites like TexAgs.com with their team musings and, at times, the kind of insider information that can doom a rival to N.C.A.A. purgatory.
snippet: College sports fans descend upon wildly popular Web sites like TexAgs.com with their team musings and, at times, the kind of insider information that can doom a rival to N.C.A.A. purgatory.
